introduction.title: Final-year NTU Student • Aspiring Professional
text: I'm a versatile and innovative web developer and software engineer.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Here are some of the technologies and tools I've worked with

main-page-cards.title: Experiences
main-page-cards.description: Here are some of my projects and experiences

content-body: Developed and maintained the frontend codebase of various projects using React, Typescript, Ant Design and ECharts
Collaborated with the UI and backend team to integrate new features and functionalities
Created Software Requirements Specifications (SRS) for various projects
Utilised CI/CD Pipelines, such as Jenkins to automate the deployment process
Developed the frontend client of the chatbot using React and Typescript
Implemented the backend server using Node.js and ExpressJS with RESTful APIs
Integrated the chatbot using an AI Python server with PyTorch and Hugging Face Transformers
Developed controls for STM32 Microcontroller to interface with sensors and motors
Implemented PID control algorithms for motor speed and steering angle control
Integrated the controls with the Raspberry Pi for autonomous navigation
Developed Computer Vision algorithms for lane detection and obstacle avoidance
Graduated with First Class Honours in Computer Engineering, with GPA of 4.66
Awarded ASEAN Scholarship for matriculation in NTU
Dean's List for Academic Year 2021 and 2023

introduction.title: Soon-to-be graduate in Singapore
text: Over the past few years, I've had the opportunity to work on a variety of projects and gain various experiences, ranging from web application development to embedded programming.
Always tinkering, always learning. The journey's been wild, and there's always more to come.

more-info.title: More about me
text: Growing up in Kuching, Malaysia, I've always been fascinated by technology and its potential to change the world. I started coding in high school and fell in love with the process of building software.
Check out my first major project, my first website built with ReactJS hosted on [Github Pages](https://bryanluwz.github.io/).
Since then, I've been on a journey to learn and grow as a software engineer, and I'm excited to see where this journey takes me.

interests.title: Feasts & Fun
text: Food first—always. From the comforting Sarawak Laksa at home in Kuching to fancy expensive pasta in Singapore, every meal is an adventure.

As for fun? I don't plan much, but when invited, I'm down—whether it's breezing through Mondsee with the birbs or gliding over Mt. Titlis in a cable car. Just going with the flow and enjoying the ride.
